extendedInfo.description: INTRODUCE:â Are you bothered by too many third-party, preinstalled apps?â Are you annoyed by the number of taps required to simply uninstall an app?â Have you ever uninstalled an app and then changed your mind?Uninstall Master may be the solution you are looking for! â New UI is clear and user-friendly.â Perform batch uninstall.â Get rid of selected pre-installed or malicious apps.  â Get rid of pre-installed bloatware that bogs down your device and costs you money.  (Note: Root privilege required for this feature)â  Silent uninstall and restore.  The prompt window no longer appears! (Requires root privileges);â  Recycle bin makes back-up and restore simple and easy.  â  Freeze and unfreeze apps. (Unlocker and root privilege required)â  Easily sort and find your apps.â  Bluetooth share: you can share apps with your friends! â  Quick and friendly customer support!NOTE:Some antivirus programs may incorrectly identify Uninstall Master as spyware.  It is not. This software does not collect any information that will invade or compromise your privacy!   TAGS:system app remover,System App Remover,Easy Uninstaller,Uninstaller,Root Explorer App App2SD , System Root Cache Cleaner System Info,Task killer Task,Browser,Dolphin,FireFoxOpera,Chrome,Maxthon,Instagram,FaceBook,Twitter

reviews.title: Perfect.
reviews.comment: Works flawlessly. It does what is advertises, without any crap. The paid only features are reasonable and again- the app doesn\'t bug you about it. Works great, download it now :)

reviews.title: Great App
reviews.comment: Ive used this app to clean up all the system apps preinstalled on my phone. It did a great job!

reviews.comment: For its purpose and in its class (it\'s free),I am yet to find either an equal or a superior application! It sure does what it says it will do. But still, I look forward to possible improvements.

reviews.title: Samsung Galaxy S4
reviews.comment: Works as described. .. doesn\'t get any easier, open app - select app to be  uninstalled & that\'s it!  I\'ve used this on every Android device I\'ve owned and never a problem!  In order to remove system apps your device has to be rooted... But that\'s with any uninstaller.  Dont waste time on other products for you will end up using this one to remove those! ;)
